response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which is valued at $800,000 by both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and unmatched benefits, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This is an exclusive chance to secure this remarkable asset at a significant discount. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer within the next 24 hours. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
